[align=center][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2331053][img]https://www.hackforums.news/assets/v4/notablethreads-mix.png[/img][/url][/align]

[color=#FFFFFF][b]Informational Threads[/b][/color]
[list]
[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6053612][color=#FFFFFF]First coronavirus death confirmed in the US[/color][/url] - [mention=3104967]
The first coronavirus death has been announced and confirmed within the USA. Many people are shocked due to the fact that President Trump said that everyone who has the virus is doing just fine and nobody has anything to worry about.

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6052941][color=#FFFFFF]World Jaystation - YouTube actually did their job[/color][/url] - [mention=4293813]
Youtube has recently demonetized a member of their platform known as JayStation, he confessed to pretending that his girlfriend had been killed and had been arrested and charged with assault. The YouTuber now has released a video stating that they are quitting YouTube.

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6053607][color=#FFFFFF]Motivation[/color][/url] - [mention=31597]
Motivation is an essential thing in everyone's life; without it, we can get nowhere. Pow3r has shared that they like the feeling of the result, almost as if its an achievement to them that they have earned.
[/list]

[color=#FFFFFF][b]Testimonials[/b][/color]
[list]
[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6046245][color=#FFFFFF]Instagram | A 7 Year HF Veteran[/color][/url] - [mention=1362017]
The uprising member known currently as Instagram has posted there a testimonial and it's a really interesting read, it even talks about how the site was very different seven years ago.

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6044714][color=#FFFFFF]666's HF Experience[/color][/url] - [mention=3731562]
Exe has released their little experience with the site and talks about how they never thought they would be so hooked to a website but here they are today still here.
[/list]

[color=#FFFFFF][b]Entertaining Threads[/b][/color]
[list]
[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6053341][color=#FFFFFF]The Hype around Hackuman is over?[/color][/url] - [mention=3459543]
flavoral has made a thread talking about how he thinks the whole trend of hackuman is dead already because the game hasn't been updated for a while, yet not everyone agrees with him and thinks that he was very wrong as a few days after he made the thread the game got updated with a brand new battle feature.

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6051249][color=#FFFFFF]Best Custom Lunge[/color][/url] - [mention=1]
Since the release of the new game (Hackuman!) was released Omniscient made a thread asking people to make a funny version of the hackuman known as Lunge. Lots of people have made some really cool ones and Omniscient has stated that Xerotic may even add them to the game in later versions.

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6053391][color=#FFFFFF][Hackuman] Battle[/color][/url] - [mention=4453921]
The latest version of the hackuman game has added the feature of battling other hackuman's from members on the site who have hatched their egg and got a monster. Everyone has started to fight each other but sadly there is no reward for taking out a monster yet.
[/list]

[color=#FFFFFF][b]Contests & Giveaways[/b][/color]
[list]
[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6051928][color=#FFFFFF]$50 BTC AWARD / 2 x $25 [REP ME][/color][/url] - [mention=3594371]
The member known as Wolf is hosting a giveaway that ends on the 23rd of March 2020, all you have to do is give the user some reputation points and post on there thread to have a chance at winning. There are two winners meaning the biggest prize is $25 BTC good luck.

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6050214][color=#FFFFFF]$400 PRIZE POOL | HUGE GIVEAWAY | MULTIPLE ENTRIES & ALL MEMBERS CAN JOIN[/color][/url] - [mention=4378438]
Want to be apart of the biggest giveaway of 2020 so far? Then look no further and enter into passCODE's giveaway you can win up to $50 bitcoin alone or even an account upgrade. Even non-upgraded members can get into this giveaway with just a few clicks and a post.

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6053548][color=#FFFFFF]$10 BTC Giveaway[/color][/url] - [mention=1456872]
TehPirate is giving away $10 bitcoin to one lucky member who enters their giveaway. The giveaway ends on March the 6th 2020. You may only enter once so everyone has the same chance to win.
[/list]

[align=center][img]https://www.hackforums.news/assets/v4/technews-invisible.png[/img][/align] [b][color=white]China Acting Against Mobile Games[/color][/b] Plague Inc., a popular mobile game launched 8 years ago, which has expanded to more than 130 million players worldwide, has been banned from China. The ban comes as coronavirus has been ramping up in China and is now spreading at a faster pace globally. British developer Ndemic Creations said, “We have some very sad news to share with our China-based players. We’ve just been informed that Plague Inc. ‘includes content that is illegal in China as determined by the Cyberspace Administration of China’ and has been removed from the China App Store. This situation is completely out of our control.” Ndemic Creations is working on bringing the game back to China but is facing difficulties as this is not an easy process to keep the game unbanned. Many players are hoping that the game will be brought back as it has helped some of them deal with the virus.[i][size=x-small][url=
https://www.bbc.com/news/technology-51673293] >>Source[/url][/size][/i] [b][color=white]Spot is on the Move[/color][/b] Spot the dog is going to land a new career. The famous Boston Dynamics robot Spot will be working at the Aker BP oil company. The mission will be to inspect an oil and gas vessel in the Norwegian Sea, with the main task of looking for any leaks and collecting data to produce reports. The company said more robots will be put in place in the future and will assist with oil operations. Massachusetts police have also recently added Spot as an extension to their bomb squad, which Spot is capable of many scenarios for any situation.[i][size=x-small][url=https://www.popularmechanics.com/technology/robots/a30872342/spot-boston-dynamics-norwegian-oil-rig/] >>Source[/url][/size][/i] [b][color=white]Happy Birthday Raspberry Pi[/color][/b] Raspberry Pi celebrates its eighth birthday (February 29), thus adding double the memory to its base model and holding the same price of $35. Currently, the Raspberry Pi 4 offers “40 times the CPU performance and eight times the memory” compared to the original Raspberry Pi that was released in 2012. The company is delighted that they had achieved the goal of being able to sell a $35 Linux desktop, “When we were first started talking about Raspberry Pi 1 Model B back in 2011, we were very clear about what we were trying to build.” This price reduction will be permanent from now on, and it is not clear whether the 1 GB Raspberry Pi model will retire with this price reduction for the latest model.[i][size=x-small][url=https://www.digitaltrends.com/computing/raspberry-pi-birthday-price-cut/] >>Source[/url][/size][/i] [align=center][img]https://hackforums.news/assets/v4/gamingnews-redsox.png[/img][/align] [b][color=white]'GTA Online' gets competitive F1 racing[/color][/b] Where does one even begin to describe the amount of activities that can take place during a single session of GTA Online? For most, driving comes to mind first. The amount of customization that can be done by the player is incredible. Rockstar has decided to step their game up yet again with their latest addition of F1 racing cars to the franchise. As part of the update, Rockstar is adding two new cars, the Ocelot R88 and the Progen PR4. You can purchase both through the in-game Legendary Motorsport store and customize them with different tires and more through Los Santos Customs.  [i][size=x-small][url=https://news.yahoo.com/2020-02-27-gta-online-open-wheel-races-rockstar.html]>>Source[/url][/size][/i] [b][color=white]Star Wars: Battlefront spin-off called “Viking” has been canceled[/color][/b] Sad news has been reported recently for fans of the popular franchise Star Wars: Battlefront. Kotaku is at it again and has just announced, according to six anonymous sources but are spoken very highly of inside the community, the development and then the cancellation of a completely new Star Wars game. This had the code name of “Viking.” This one was apparently a spin-off from the Star Wars Battlefront saga.   [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.vg247.com/2020/02/22/ea-third-star-wars-title-canceled-battlefront-spin-off-report/]>>Source[/url][/size][/i] [b][color=white]Microsoft confirms 12 teraflop target for Xbox Series X[/color][/b] Microsoft is set to release the newest addition to its console family this Holiday season. Microsoft has confirmed the Xbox Series X GPU is targeting 12 TFLOPS of computing power, in line with the recent AMD leak. The GPU is based on AMD’s RDNA 2 architecture, and the CPU is built on Zen 2. Xbox Series X supports up to 120fps. As you can see from the specs that Microsoft has released so far, this thing is quite powerful for a console that is. The company says the GPU is twice as powerful as Xbox One X, and over eight times that of the original Xbox One.  [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.vg247.com/2020/02/24/xbox-series-x-12-teraflop-confirmed-amd-rdna-2-zen-2/]>>Source[/url][/size][/i] [align=center][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=4570721][img]https://hackforums.news/assets/v4/animenews-megane.png[/img][/url][/align] [b][color=white]Coronavirus Continues to Cancel Major Events[/color][/b] Many are shocked that one of the biggest anime conventions in Japan, AnimeJapan 2020, has been canceled for everyone's safety due to the coronavirus. A couple of editions ago, an article was written about the Anime Tourism Association having a special event for those that are outside of Japan to be able to visit the country, and even attend the AnimeJapan convention. Not only has the virus canceled big events such as AnimeJapan 2020, but the virus has caused cancelations for upcoming episodes of anime that are airing and even future anime that will be releasing in the spring season. Additionally, in the last edition, there was a report on other cancelations, such as Bandori's major cancelation, where they had to cancel major events relating to their mobile games, new anime, and much more. This time, we have Bandai Namco having to cancel their Love Live! event. The coronavirus is getting out of control and it is very scary how much it is affecting things. [i][size=x-small][url=URL]>>Source[/url][/size][/i] [b][color=white]Greninja Wins 'Pokémon of the Year' in Official Fan Vote[/color][/b] There are an estimated 896 different types of Pokémon in the Pokémon franchise. Everyone has their own favorite Pokémon, and there are many different reasons why we may choose a favorite. For instance, the look of the Pokémon might be cute and adorable. Another example would be that the Pokémon's personality is just like you. Well, most recently, a public vote was created to see who the best all-time Pokémon was. Some might think that the face of the Pokémon company, Pikachu, is the best, but you might be surprised with who the top three highest-ranked Pokémon were. At the number one spot, Greninja has won Pokémon of the Year. Geninja was able to win with an outstanding 140,000 votes. The runner up with 102,000 votes was Lucario. Surprisingly enough, Lucario was able to make a huge comeback, going from fifteenth place to third. Making their way into the third-place spot is Mimikyu, everyone's favorite Pikachu clone. Who is your favorite Pokémon? [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/interest/2020-02-28/greninja-wins-pokemon-of-the-year-in-official-fan-vote/.156332]>>Source[/url][/size][/i] [b][color=white]Apple Japan Releases Reel of Anime Featuring Mac Computers[/color][/b] A very common trend has been occurring in Japan when it comes to commercials for popular products and places. You might assume that because anime is so big in Japan, that anime has a huge influence when it comes to commercials, movies, tv, and more. This is true to an extent. What's starting to occur more are companies creating anime shorts to advertise their products. In December of last year, McDonald's made an anime short, featuring food from the Japanese region, most likely advertising a nice warm meal to eat after traveling in the cold weather. You can check that short [url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8OuW0RAmw9I]here[/url]. The latest anime short to be created for a company is by Apple Japan. Apple recently created a 38-second short anime film. Included in the short was snippets from different anime that some may know, such as New Game. The snippets had scenes where characters were using some sort of laptop, however, the laptop had the famous half-eaten apple logo that Apple is known for. You can see that video [url=https://youtu.be/V85CQzsyvj4]here[/url]. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/interest/2020-02-28/apple-japan-releases-reel-of-anime-featuring-mac-computers/.156934]>>Source[/url][/size][/i] [b][color=white]Australian Senator Calls For Review of Anime Depicting 'Child Exploitation'[/color][/b] This topic might be a weird one for some, but those who are familiar with anime have probably heard the term "loli," which is a reference from the book Lolita that was written by Vladimir Nabokov. The book is about a man who is middle-aged and has a liking for a girl who is around twelve. How this relates to anime is the number of characters who depict younger girls. The majority of the time, the way to make this acceptable is by stating their age being over 18. However, this is not only the case. There are countless amounts of famous characters who are underaged and liked by anime fans. The South Australian senator Stirling Griff brought forth to the Australian parliament that anime depicting young girls in sexualizing manners should be reviewed. In most places, including Australia, you are not allowed to produce, possess, or distribute any pornographic material relating to children, even if it has to do with drawings. One of the anime under the radar in Australia is "Eromanga Sensei," which depicts a solid case of incest as well as multiple underage girls interested in sexual things, such as genitalia, and much more. While this may be unacceptable elsewhere, Japan's laws state that when it comes to child pornography, cartoon characters, such as those in anime and manga, are exempt. What do you think of the matter? [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/interest/2020-02-25/australian-senator-calls-for-review-of-anime-depicting-child-exploitation/.156852]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]
